data.title: Welcome to Oakland Schools Technical Campuses - Northeast
data.meta_description: Oakland Schools Technical Campuses - Northeast (OSTC-NE) provides high-quality career technical education to high school students throughout Oakland County. OSTC-NE campus is in Pontiac, MI 48340. 248-451-2700
data.text:
Welcome to our Northeast Campus, conveniently located just minutes away from downtown Pontiac. Our campus serves students who live in or attend schools in the Avondale, Lake Orion, Oxford, Pontiac, and Rochester districts.

Studies have shown that students enrolled in Career and Technical Education (CTE) courses have higher graduation rates than those who did not take CTE courses. Our expert instructors are committed to ensuring that all students achieve not only gain a clear understanding of their core academics but also receive high levels of hands-on instruction.

At OSTC-NE, we offer a range of CTE programs that provide students with the technical skills and academic knowledge needed to prepare for future employment and/or a successful transition to post-secondary education. Our rigorous education programs are designed to meet the needs of each student, and our instructors are dedicated to helping students achieve their full potential.
